description:
Spring is in the air, and the Cherry Blossoms are blooming. The girls wonder if they should be busier, while Nyamo and Yukari wonder if they, as adults, are too childish. 
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Akubi Meijin / Nandaka Seishun / Otona no Hanami / Kodomo no Hanami / Sakura
Gähn-Champion / Flüchtige Jugend / Kirschblüten gucken für Erwachsene / Kirschblüten gucken für Kinder / Kirschblüten
Haukottelemisen mestari - Nuoruuden kevät - Aikuisten juhla - Lasten juhla - Kirsikankukka
